mapper.select: select email_template_id, company_id, name, subject_template, body_template, status, created_by, created_at, updated_at from email_templates where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or company_id is null) and status = 'ACTIVE' order by case when company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 0 else 1 end limit 1
